archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Order Handling
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Responsible for accepting and issuing orders.

properties.value: Order Handling processes are responsible for accepting and issuing orders. They deal with pre-order feasibility determination, credit authorization, order issuance, order status and tracking, customer update on order activities and customer notification on order completion.
